V05bsu011_u:1_1: ye ca te bodhisattvānāṃ trayaḥ śīlaskandhā uktāḥ /
V05bsu011_u:1_2: saṃvara śīlaṃ kuśaladharmmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca teṣu śikṣitukāmena gṛhiṇā vā pravrajitena vā 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānena sahadhārmmikasya bodhisattvasya mahāpuṇyanidhānasya vāg vijñaptyartha grahaṇāvabodhasamarthasya pādayornnipatyādhyeṣaṇā kāryā /
V05bsu011_u:1_5: / trirevamadhyeṣya ekāṃsamuttarāṅgaṃ kṛtvādaśasu dikṣvatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛttvā teṣāṃ guṇānāmukhīkṛtya ghanarasaṃ cetaḥprasādaṃ saṃjanayya nīcairjānumaṇḍalenotkuṭukena vā sthitvā tathāgatapratimāṃ purataḥ saṃsthāpya saṃpūjya puraskṛtyaivaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
V05bsu011_u:2_0: anuprayaccha me kulaputrāyuṣmān bhadanteti vā bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānamiti /
V05bsu011_u:3_1: na cirasyedānī me 'kṣayasyāprameyasya niruttarasya mahāpuṇyanidhānasya prāptirbhaviṣyatīti /
V05bsu011_u:3_3: tena punarvvijñena bodhisattvena sa tathā pratipanno bodhisattvo 'vikṣiptena cetasā sthitena vā niṣaṇṇena vā evaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
V05bsu011_u:3_4: śṛṇu tvamevannāman kulaputrāyuṣman bhadanteti vā bodhisattvo 'si bodhau ca kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ /
V05bsu011_u:3_5: tena omiti pratijñātavyaṃ / sa punaruttari evaṃsyādvacanīyaḥ /
V05bsu011_u:3_6: pratīcchasi tvamevannāman kulaputrāyuṣmān bhadanteti vā bodhisattvo 'si bodhau kṛtapraṇidhāno mamāntikāt sarvvāṇi bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvvañca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca yacchīlamatītānāṃ bodhisattvanāmabhūt yāni ca śikṣāpadāni /
V05bsu011_u:3_7: yacchīlamanāgatānām bodhisattvānāṃ bhaviṣyati yāni ca śikṣāpadāni /
V05bsu011_u:3_8: yacchīlametarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bhavati yāni ca śikṣāpadāni /
V05bsu011_u:3_9: yeṣu ca śikṣāpadeṣu yeṣu śīleṣvatītāḥ sarvvabodhisattvāḥ śikṣitavantaḥ /
V05bsu011_u:4_0: samanvāharantu māṃ daśadiglokadhānusannipatitā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāḥ /
V05bsu011_u:4_1: samanvāharatvācāryyo 'hamevannāmā yatkiñcitkāyavāṅmanobhirbuddha bodhisattvān mātāpitarau tadanyān vā sattvān samāgamyehajanmanyanyeṣu vā janmāṃ tareṣu mayāpāyaṃ kṛtaṃ kāritamanumoditam vā tat sarvvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā sarvvabuddhabodhisattvānāmācāryyasya cāntike 'grayā pravarayā pratideśanayā pratideśayāmi jānan smaran na praticchādayāmi /
V05bsu011_u:5_0: sohamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyaya imaṃ divasamupādāya āvodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāt buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahākārūṇikaṃ sarvvajñaṃ sarvvadarśinaṃ sarvvavairabhayātītaṃ mahāpuruṣamabhedyakāyamanuttarakāyaṃ dharmmakāyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānāmagryam /
V05bsu011_u:5_1: / so 'hamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyaya imaṃ divasamupādāya ābodhimaṇḍadiṣadanāddharma śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi śāntaṃ virāgāṇāṃ pravaram /
V05bsu011_u:5_2: so 'hamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyaya imaṃ divasamupādāya ābodhimaṇḍaniṣadanādavaivarttikabodhisattvasaṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi gaṇāṇāṃ śreṣṭham /
V05bsu011_u:6_0: sohamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyayastriśaraṇagato 'nantasattvadhātūttāraṇāyābhyuddharaṇāya saṃsāraduḥkhāt paritrāṇāya sarvvajñajñāne anuttare pratiṣṭhāpanāya /
V05bsu011_u:6_1: yathā te atītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā bodhicittamutpādya buddhatvamadhigatavanto 'dhigamiṣyanti adhigacchanti ca /
V05bsu011_u:6_2: yathā sarvvabuddhā 'nāvaraṇena buddhajñānena buddh cakṣuṣā jānanti paśyanti yathā dharmmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāma(?) nujānanti /
V05bsu011_u:6_3: tena vidhinā ahamevaṃnāmā evaṃnāmna ācāryyasyāntikāt sarvvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ ca purato 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpādayāmi /
V05bsu011_u:7_0: idaṃ cāhamatyayadeśanātriśaraṇagamanabodhicittotpādajanitaṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmi yadahaṃ loke aśaraṇe alayane aparāyaṇe 'dvipe trāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ layaṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ dvīpo bhaveyam /
V05bsu011_u:8_1: pratigṛhya ca yathāśakti yathābalam yathājñānaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ samāropayāmi /
V05bsu011_u:8_2: itaḥ prabhṛti yatkiñcit dānaṃ dāsyāmi śīlaṃ rakṣiṣyāmi kṣāṃti saṃpādayiṣyāmi vīryamārabhya dhyānaṃ samāpatsye prajñayā vyavacāryya upāyakauśalyaṃ vā śikṣiṣye tat sarvvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya /
V05bsu011_u:9_0: uttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya teṣāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahākāruṇikāṇāṃ mahāyāne sāmicīmanupravrajāmi /
V05bsu011_u:9_1: anupravrajya bodhisattvo 'haṃ bodhisattva iti māmitaḥ prabhṛtyācāryyo dhārayatu /
V05bsu011_u:10_0: tatastenācāryyeṇa tasyāḥ pratimāyāḥ purato daśasu dikṣu buddhabodhisattvānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ pādayornnipatya sāmicīṃ kṛtvā evamārocayitavyam /
V05bsu011_u:10_1: gṛhītamanenaivaṃnāmnā bodhisattvena mamaivaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikāt yāvat trirapi bodhisatvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
V05bsu011_u:10_2: sohamevaṃnāmā bodhisattva ātmānaṃ sākṣibhūtaṃ prajānan asyaivaṃnāmno bodhisattvasya paramāryyāṇāṃ viparokṣāṇāmapi sarvatra sarvvasattvānāṃ viparokṣabuddhīnāṃ daśadikṣvanantāparyyanteṣu lokadhātuṣvārocayāmi /
V05bsu011_u:11_0: evaṃ punaḥ śīlasaṃvarasamādānakarmmasamāptyanantaraṃ dharmmatā khalveṣā yad daśasu dikṣvanantāparyyantesu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ tadrupaṃ nimittam prādurbhavati yena teṣāmevaṃ bhavati /
V05bsu011_u:11_1: evaṃnāmnā bodhisattvena evaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikāt bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvara samādānaṃ samāttamiti /
V05bsu011_u:12_0: yadi tairguṇairyuktaḥ pudgalo na sannihitaḥ syāt tato bodhisattvena tathāgatapratimāyāḥ purataḥ svayamapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādāne vacanīyam /
V05bsu011_u:12_1: evaṃ ca karaṇīyam / ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā daśasu dikṣvatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya utkuṭukena vā idam syādvacanīyam /
V05bsu011_u:12_2: ahamevaṃnāmā daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatān mahābhūmipraviṣṭāṃśca bodhisattvān vijñāpayāmi /
V05bsu011_u:12_3: teṣāṃ purataḥ sarvvāṇi bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni sarvvaṃ ca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ samādade /
V05bsu011_u:12_4: yacchīlamityādi pūrvvavat yāvat bodhisattvo bodhisattva iti /
V05bsu011_u:12_5: māmitaḥ prabhṛti buddha bhagavanto bodhisattvāśca dhārayantviti vijñaptiḥ /
